quiz_1_feedback_1.eng: Wonderful, I am so happy! Keep up the good work.

quiz_1_feedback_2.eng: Sorry to hear that things are difficult. All families struggle. @global.app_name is here to help!

quiz_1_feedback_3.eng: If you feel something went ‘wrong’ today, let it go and try again tomorrow. It is okay!

quiz_1_feedback_4.eng: It is understandable to sometimes feel stressed. You are doing a great job and deserve a little break. Slowly breathe in and breathe out.

quiz_1_feedback_5.eng: When you have a lot to do, it’s easy to forget to drink water. Dehydration can make you feel tired, so don’t forget to drink enough water!
